A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Couple of spoilers in here. These non critic reviewers must think Mark Hammill was going to keep making movies into his 80s. The guy is old. He’s not the future of the franchise. I have no interest in seeing a 70 something year old Luke in light saber battles. And for the record. he went out with a lot more dignity and honor than I expected after reading reviews. Overall I enjoyed the movie. Yes the Leah space scene was unrealistic\, but so were many other former Star Wars scenes\, like ummm...Anakin not dying immediately after losing half his body. Yes I know Sidious saved him but cmon\, impossible. I’m interested in seeing where this goes next. Just because they didn’t answer where Snoke came from doesn’t mean they won’t. Just because Kylo said Rey’s parents were junkers doesn’t mean they are. There’s definitely opportunity for some back stories. Kylo is still a bit torn between the dark side and the light\, but so was Anakin even after he became Vader as evidence by saving Luke from Sidous. The next one can’t come soon enough.
